price: In the legal retribution, there is [saving of] life for you, O people of understanding, so that you may become righteous.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡقِصَاصِ حَيَوٰةٞ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ
